text.quote: 106A*: After Clause 141, insert the following new Clause—
text.IndentOne: In Schedule 9 to the Electricity Act 1989 (preservation of amenity and fisheries) at the beginning insert—
text.quote: “(A1) Only a licence holder or a person authorised by exemption to generate, transmit, distribute or supply electricity shall formulate relevant proposals for the purposes of paragraphs 1 and 3 of this Schedule.”
